title: Chapter 1086 - A Hostage
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1086 - A Hostage

Pi Mo had always had a steady heart.

The other eight legacy disciples of the Grotto of Abstruse Force said that he’d stand tall and unmoving even when buffeted by winds on all sides.

In the Wilds, they said that Pi Mo’s emotions didn’t show on his face.

But now, he’d descended into a rare fit of explosive fury. His plans had failed completely!

He didn’t care about his dead pawns. The lives of Garuda and the Yao Emperors had never meant anything to him.

What really enraged him was the strength Su Yi had displayed in that grand battle!

Breaking the Heavenly Yao Refines the Firmament Combat Formation didn’t amount to much. What startled Pi Mo was that neither Elder Yin nor the Starry Combat Diagram could touch Su Yi!

Pi Mo sank into silence, his expression shifting and uncertain. “Can a Profound Illumination cultivator… really be that strong?” 

The trap he’d arranged was enough to kill even the Wilds’ Profound Unity experts!

Who’d have thought that it’d still fail in the end?

Who wouldn’t have been startled?
